dmca.title: Highly possible copyright infringement (and other)
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

 

________________________________

From: Bouffard [mailto:thekleaner@gmail.com] 
Sent: Thursday, March 08, 2007 10:52 AM
To: zzzzzz
Subject: Highly possible copyright infringement (and other)

 

Subject URLs: http://www.dj-grim.com http://www.europk.net

The first site hosts an online radio which does not pay licensing fees,
yet plays copyrighted music. 

The second site is hosted on the same server, administrated by the same
person, and are somehow linked together.

Also, europk.net hosts trojaned programs, which may be deleted at this
point, but I'm sure your logs will prove they were there.
